meanings.definition: Relating to the sense of hearing.
meanings.sent1: The aural experience of listening to music can be very enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: She had an aural understanding of the sounds around her.
meanings.sent3: The aural puzzle game challenged players to identify different sounds.
meanings.sent4: His aural memory was like a library filled with the sounds of nature.
meanings.sent5: The aural landscape of the forest was filled with chirping birds and rustling leaves.

meanings.definition: Perceived by or relating to the ear.
meanings.sent1: The aural feedback from the headphones was crystal clear.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used an aural thermometer to check her temperature.
meanings.sent3: The aural illusion made it seem like the sound was coming from a different direction.
meanings.sent4: Her aural perception was so acute that she could hear a pin drop in the next room.
meanings.sent5: The aural sensation of the wind blowing through the trees was calming.
